name: Pass the torch! - Weekly Game Jam 168
name_original: Pass the torch! - Weekly Game Jam 168
description:
This is an endless runner for two players.

One player starts playing, then at some point the message "Pass the torch!" appears and the other player takes over.

If one player fails, one point is given to the other and vice versa.

Left player uses W to jump and S to duck. Right player uses up and down arrow keys.

It can be played by a single person as well by keeping one hand on W and S and the other one on the arrow keys.

NOTICE: if you experience problems with sounds playing multiple times please reload the page once or twice. It should solve the issue.

Have fun :-)
